title: 第七届区域代数学会议于2025.3.20-3.23举办
content: The 7th Regional Meeting in Algebra March 20-23, 2025 Scientific Committee Efim Zelmanov (South University of Science and Technology) Jiping Zhang (Peking University) Organizing Committee Chengming Bai (Nankai University) Vyacheslav Futorny (South University of Science and Technology) Guilai Liu (Nankai University) Zhenyu Zhou (Nankai University) Contact Information Dr. Guilai Liu（ 刘贵来 ) E-mail ： liugl@mail.nankai.edu.cn Dr. Zhenyu Zhou （周政宇） E-mail: 9820230052@nankai.edu.cn Schedule of Lectures.pdf Registration: 14:00-20:00, March 20, 2025 Place: Jiayuan Hotel ( 南开大学嘉园宾馆 ) Nankai University, 94 Weijin Road, Tianjin, P.R. China Jiayuan Hotel Tel.: +86 22 2350 6281
